backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing lease listings, lease requests, user profiles, and access control for admin and user roles.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking a UI feature update to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten map of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, theme provider, and profile modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Badge showing the logged‑in user's profile name when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling II login/logout with loading states and adjusted label behavior.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper blocking access to protected content and showing a sign‑in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests for owners with status updates, loading states, and empty handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Modal dialog for creating or editing lease listings with form validation and submission handlers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Shows owner lease listings with options to create, edit, archive, and update availability.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper including top navigation, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing links, social icons, and attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Reusable empty-state card displaying a title and description.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card view of a lease listing showing code, split ratio, availability, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Marketing section promoting the Unity Network mobile app with store links and branding.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Displays a grid of embedded YouTube Shorts with titles and descriptions plus a link to the full channel.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Renders the top navigation bar with links, login controls, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit lease requests or prompts unauthenticated users to sign in.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Shows a table of the user's lease requests with status, submission date, and message, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to expose authentication status, principal info, and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch public and owner-specific lease listings using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Provides hooks for submitting lease requests, retrieving tenant/owner requests, and updating request statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Defines mutations for creating, updating, archiving, and managing availability of lease listings with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the actor API and invalidate cached data on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, and applies global typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated dashboard with tabs for offers, incoming requests, and user requests, plus a YouTube shorts section.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an overview of how the platform works, including step-by-step cards and information about ULO lease codes.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides the marketing landing page with a hero section, app features, and links to browse lease listings.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single lease listing, including availability, copy-to-clipboard code actions, and a request form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Lists public lease listings with sorting, loading skeletons, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a simple 404 page with navigation back to the home screen.
frontend/src/utils/leaseAvailability.ts: Provides helper functions to translate lease status into UI display info and unavailable messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s current state, constraints, requirements, issues, and existing feature tracking for an ICP-hosted lease-listing site.
